attributes.action: Compel ALL former Eastern Block Migrant Workers to apply for a work permit to seek work in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sensibly manage the issue by controlled issuance of work permits in relation to impact studies on a sensible level that communities can effectively absorb without impacting services and resources.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
